title: Transform solar energy to usable form

content.question: Directions: Answers must be in essay form. Outline form is not acceptable. Labeled diagrams may be used to supplement discussion, but in no case will a diagram alone suffice. It is important that you read each question completely before you begin. In many ways, all organisms in a food web can be said to be solar-powered. The producer level of the food web is responsible for the transformation of the solar energy into a form that can be used by other living organisms. (a) Discuss the role of green plants in transforming the Sun’s energy into a form that can ultimately be used by heterotrophs.

frqParts.text: Directions: Answers must be in essay form. Outline form is not acceptable. Labeled diagrams may be used to supplement discussion, but in no case will a diagram alone suffice. It is important that you read each question completely before you begin. In many ways, all organisms in a food web can be said to be solar-powered. The producer level of the food web is responsible for the transformation of the solar energy into a form that can be used by other living organisms. (a) Discuss the role of green plants in transforming the Sun’s energy into a form that can ultimately be used by heterotrophs.
(b) Discuss the flow of energy from producers through top carnivores in a food web in terms of the laws of thermodynamics.
